title: Render chatroom category tags as bottom-right thumbnail overlays in lobby cards

requirements.summary: Move chatroom category tag from under-title placement into a bottom-right overlay within the chatroom thumbnail, keeping it legible and non-overlapping with the LIVE badge.
acceptanceCriteria: In the lobby grid, for any chatroom with a non-empty category, the category tag appears inside the thumbnail area as a bottom-right overlay.
The category tag no longer renders next to the chatroom title under the thumbnail.
The overlay tag remains legible over bright/dark thumbnails (e.g., via background scrim/opacity and appropriate text styling).
The overlay tag does not overlap the existing LIVE badge (LIVE stays top-left; category stays bottom-right).
Chatroom cards without a category render no category tag overlay and the layout does not shift unexpectedly.

file_operations.description: Update the card layout so the category label renders as an absolute-positioned bottom-right overlay within the thumbnail container (and remove the existing category <Badge> next to the title). Use the existing shadcn-ui Badge component for the overlay styling with an added readability treatment (e.g., semi-opaque background/scrim and appropriate text styling) and ensure it stays clear of the existing top-left LIVE badge. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
